name: Assembly Emulator
description: A custom-designed ISA with C-style assembly syntax, with full parser and emulator in Java to demonstrate my proficiency in COMP2300 and COMP2100 content.

name: Open Source Contribution - JDA
description: Implements support for reading, writing and modifying system channel flags for the Java Discord API. This repository has 4.6k stars, and is used by many. My contribute adds around 500 lines of code.

name: Kompakt
description: A compact and convenient JSON serialiser for Java, aimed to resolve verbosity of libraries such as Gson.

name: Personal Website
description: This is the website you are currently viewing, built using React and Typescript.

name: gradethink
description: This is a simple CLI tool developed in C to calculate and speculate course grades.

name: QuAC CPU
description: For an assignment, I extended ANU's [QuAC](https://comp.anu.edu.au/courses/comp2300/resources/08-QuAC-ISA/) assembly to support a decreasing function call stack, pre/post-offset, immediate, and base+offset memory operations, conditional execution, ALU immediate formats, and built a microarchitecture for it using basic circuits and logic gates.

name: Literature Review
description: For an introductory research course, I wrote a literature review on the topic of neural cryptanalysis.

name: Berklee.ai
description: Discord bot that casually generates music theory (harmony) practice questions for Berklee students.
